title: Opinion: Prince Philip was flawed. He was also family
description: In 2016, Queen Elizabeth II turned 90. Devoted subjects crowded outside Buckingham Palace to cheer.  One told a newspaper that they'd come to celebrate "the mother of the nation."

title: Facebook will not notify the half-billion users exposed in data leak
description: Facebook does not plan to notify its customers who may be among the half a billion users whose personal information was exposed after being posted to a website used by hackers.

title: Waterkeeper says this industry is Florida's 'biggest dirtiest secret'
description: Scientists are ramping up their efforts to track the nutrient-rich wastewater, contaminated by the Piney Point phosphogypsum stack, that's being dumped into Florida's Tampa Bay, as concern remains high that it could supercharge potential toxic algae blooms, including red tide.

title: ADL calls on Fox News to fire Tucker Carlson over racist comments about 'replacement' theory
description: The Anti-Defamation League, a well-respected Jewish advocacy group, is calling for Fox News to fire Tucker Carlson.

title: NRA CEO says he needed to take shelter on a yacht
description: Prosecutors are accusing the National Rifle Association (NRA) of exploiting the bankruptcy process to sidestep its growing legal troubles. CNN's Brynn Gingras has the details.

title: Golfer forced to putt with 3-wood after breaking putter in frustration at Masters
Evacuations continue after Caribbean volcano's explosive eruption
description: A volcano on the island of St. Vincent in the Caribbean erupted, authorities reported Friday, sending ash plumes 20,000 feet into the air.

title: Iconic cellist plays for Anderson Cooper
description: Cellist Yo-Yo Ma plays music for Anderson Cooper on Full Circle to foster a sense of comfort. Watch "Full Circle" every Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 6pm E.T.

title: NASA's Artemis program will land the first person of color on the moon
description: The Artemis program will land the first person of color on the moon, according to NASA. The new goal for the program comes from the Biden-Harris administration.

title: The Ingenuity helicopter will fly on Mars this weekend. What to expect
description: The Ingenuity helicopter is preparing for its historic flight on Mars this weekend. The first powered, controlled flight on another planet will take place Sunday at 12:30 p.m. local Mars solar time, or about 10:54 p.m. ET.

title: Tributes to Prince Philip pour in from around the world
description: World leaders, politicians and celebrities have sent their condolences after the announcement of Prince Philip's death.

title: Legendary rapper DMX dies at age 50
description: DMX, a rapper known as much for his troubles as his music, has died, his family announced in a statement. He was 50.

title: Elon Musk's Neuralink claims monkeys can play Pong using just their minds
description: Neuralink, the implant company owned by SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk, has released a video in which a monkey appears to play the computer game Pong using only its mind.

title: Prince Philip's life in pictures
description: Prince Philip, the husband of Britain's Queen Elizabeth II, has died, Buckingham Palace confirmed on Friday, April 9. He was 99.

title: Russian forces are massing on Ukraine's border. Bluff or not, Putin is playing with fire
How the Duke of Edinburgh helped keep the Royals together
description: Known more for his controversial comments and being one step behind the Queen, Prince Philip played an important role in the royal household as its patriarch. CNN takes a look at his life.

title: World's top new watches unveiled
description: Around this time of year, lifestyle journalists would be regaling watch enthusiasts with tales from Richemont's ritzy Watches & Wonders trade fair (formerly Salon International de la Haute Horlogerie, SIHH) at Geneva's Palexpo convention center, and the historic Baselworld, where every other watchmaker, from Alpina to Zenith, is hosted and toasted in the Herzog & de Meuron-designed Messe exhibition complex.

title: South Korea unveils KF-21 fighter jet, a cheaper alternative to US-made F-35
description: South Korea unveiled its homegrown supersonic jet fighter on Friday, joining an exclusive club of military aviation giants and setting the stage for a $5.2 billion program it hopes will be a top export driver and jobs creator.

title: How a brash Matt Gaetz climbed the ranks in Trump's Washington
At least one person killed and five wounded in shooting at Texas office park
description: One person was killed and at least five others were wounded -- four of them critically -- in a shooting at an industrial park in Bryan, Texas, on Thursday afternoon, police said.

title: Ex-NFL player suspected of killing five people in shooting before taking his own life
description: • At least 1 dead, 5 wounded in Texas shooting

title: Island on red alert for 'imminent' volcanic eruption
description: St. Vincent and the Grenadines Prime Minister Ralph Gonsalves on Thursday declared a disaster alert prompted by a change in the eruptive activity at the La Soufrière volcano, according to the country's National Emergency Management Organization.
